txt.en:
My adventurous sibling,

My own journey has begun, at last! Grimbeorn has finally relented, and he sent me forth to find you! I will travel through the High Pass and come to Rivendell. Find me there, and we will speak of our adventures! I understand the Elves of Rivendell gather at a place called the Spire of Meeting? Let us meet there!

Sterkist
